summary: Designed The Chronicle - a persistent journalist agent inspired by Letta's memory blocks and sleep-time compute. Created MVP skill for capturing session memory blocks.
accomplished: Researched Letta framework (memory blocks, sleep-time compute, self-hosting)
Defined MVP: Continuity Threads for tracking pending work
Created pattern mining and preference learning designs
Built minimal /chronicle skill with block storage
pending: Test /chronicle in new session (skill discovery requires restart)
Implement Stop hook for automatic thread extraction
Backfill from last 30 days of history.jsonl
notes: First Chronicle block! The system is bootstrapping itself.
